name: Deathstation (DeadSpace sc2 version)
description:
Hi,

this is the first 5minutes of the map "Deathstation". Story: You heared something. Now you notice that you sleep, slowly you woke up. The system opens the door, you dont know where you are. Suddenly, Soldieres open the fire, you have to kill them, then you saw something infested, and then you feel the claws in your armor...

Control: Fire (Left Mousebutton) Zoom (Right Mousebutton) Manual reload (R) Flashlight (RECOMMEND) (F) Weapons: R-A Autorifle (3 Bullets per second) (0.3 Firerate), 50 Ammunition C-11 Hittingrifle (1 bullet per second) (0.9 Firerate), 12 Ammunition Change weapons with 1 and 2. Thanks to Shadowstorm for the movement (Engine)! Thanks to the guys at [http://cafe.naver.com](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252fcafe.naver.com%252f>) for the Cinematic Models!

Have fun.
author: _ForgeUser6443377
